name: Aromatic Mist
summary: Aromatic Mist will raise the Special Defense of a target Ally Pok√©mon. Fails if the target is under Crafty Shield.
viability: In singles, this is useless. In Doubles and Triples, this can provide a use to let a sweeper stay in longer. It can also turn a physical wall into a mixed wall. Aromatisse is rather slow, though, so use this at your own discretion.
